sqlMap.select: SELECT tb1.ted,counts1,counts2 FROM (SELECT YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`) ted FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# AND t.`trade_status` IN (2,3,8) GROUP BY ted) tb1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) counts2,YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`) ted FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# AND t.`trade_status` IN(2,8) GROUP BY ted) tb2 ON tb1.ted = tb2.ted LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) counts1,YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`) ted FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# AND t.`trade_status`='3' GROUP BY ted) tb3 ON tb1.ted = tb3.ted ORDER BY tb1.ted DESC LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

SELECT COUNT(tb1.ted) FROM (SELECT YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`) ted FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# AND t.`trade_status` IN (2,3,8) GROUP BY ted) tb1
SELECT COUNT(*) counts1 FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# AND t.`trade_status`=#status#

SELECT tb1.ted,tb2.counts2,tb3.counts1 FROM (SELECT MONTH(t.`trade_expire_date`) months,YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`) years,CONCAT(YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`),'-',MONTH(t.`trade_expire_date`)) ted FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_expire_date` >= #startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date` <= #endTime# GROUP BY ted) tb1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`),'-',MONTH(t.`trade_expire_date`)) ted, IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) counts2 FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_status` IN (2,8) AND t.`trade_expire_date` >= #startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date` <= #endTime# GROUP BY ted)tb2 ON tb1.ted = tb2.ted LEFT JOIN (SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`),'-',MONTH(t.`trade_expire_date`)) ted, IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) counts1 FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_status` = '3' AND t.`trade_expire_date` >= #startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date` <= #endTime# GROUP BY ted) tb3 ON tb1.ted = tb3.ted ORDER BY tb1.years DESC,tb1.months DESC LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

SELECT COUNT(tb1.months) FROM (SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`),'-',MONTH(t.`trade_expire_date`)) months FROM trade t WHERE YEAR(t.`trade_expire_date`) >= #startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date` <= #endTime# GROUP BY months) tb1
SELECT COUNT(*) counts1 FROM trade t WHERE t.`trade_status` = #status# AND t.`trade_expire_date` >= #startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date` <= #endTime#

SELECT tb1.real_name ted,counts1,counts2 FROM (SELECT u.`user_id`,u.real_name FROM loan_demand l INNER JOIN trade t ON l.`demand_id`=t.`demand_id` INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.`user_id` = l.`loaner_id` WHERE t.`trade_status` IN (3,2) AND t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# GROUP BY u.`user_id`) tb1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.`user_id`, COUNT(t.`trade_id`) counts2 FROM loan_demand l INNER JOIN trade t ON l.`demand_id`=t.`demand_id` INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.`user_id` = l.`loaner_id` WHERE t.`trade_status` IN (2,8) AND t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# GROUP BY u.`user_id`) tb2 ON tb1.user_id = tb2.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.`user_id`, COUNT(t.`trade_id`) counts1 FROM loan_demand l INNER JOIN trade t ON l.`demand_id`=t.`demand_id` INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.`user_id` = l.`loaner_id` WHERE t.`trade_status`='3' AND t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# GROUP BY u.`user_id`) tb3 ON tb1.user_id = tb3.user_id LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#

SELECT COUNT(t.user_id) FROM (SELECT u.`user_id` ,u.real_name FROM loan_demand l INNER JOIN trade t ON l.`demand_id`=t.`demand_id` INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.`user_id` = l.`loaner_id` WHERE t.`trade_status` IN (8,3,2) AND t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime# GROUP BY u.`user_id`) t

SELECT COUNT(t.trade_id) FROM loan_demand l INNER JOIN trade t ON l.`demand_id`=t.`demand_id` INNER JOIN user_base_info u ON u.`user_id` = l.`loaner_id` WHERE t.`trade_status`=#status# AND t.`trade_expire_date`>=#startTime# AND t.`trade_expire_date`<=#endTime#
